dictionary.definition: 1. A misfortune. 2. A serious bone fracture.

dictionary.definition: A proverb that suggests a poor workman tends to look for an excuse for his poor work.

dictionary.definition: Better value for your money.

dictionary.phrase: A golden key can open any door

dictionary.definition: Failure is certain if those on the same side argue amongst themselves.

dictionary.phrase: A leopard can't change his spots
dictionary.definition: You cannot change your innate self.

dictionary.definition: A kindred spirit. Someone who thinks as I do.

dictionary.definition: Some endeavours either succeed or they donât - to miss narrowly is still failure.

dictionary.definition: Anything you save has the same effect as adding to your income.

dictionary.definition: The use of excessive resources to overcome a small problem.
